Steps: Fill a mug or heat-proof glass with 8 ounces of hot water.
Put 1 tablespoon of honey in the mug.
Add 2 tablespoons of freshly-squeezed lemon juice.
Stir until the honey is dissolved.
Garnish with a cinnamon stick or a lemon slice.
Hot Toddy.Reason: The Hot Toddy is the perfect drink for a foggy, sad day. Its warm ingredients will help you feel comforted and its combination of whiskey, honey, and lemon is sure to lift your spirits.

Steps: Fill a mug or heat-proof glass with 8 ounces of hot coffee.
Put 1 tablespoon of brown sugar in the mug.
Add 1 teaspoon of freshly-whipped cream on top.
Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.
Irish Coffee.Reason: Irish Coffee is a great drink for foggy and sad days. Its combination of coffee, whiskey, and sugar will help to wake you up and its creaminess will make you feel cozy and comforted.
